definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: This thesis introduced the whole processes of the development of the tobacco flavor management information system .
sentences.chinese: 本論文介紹了香精香料管理信息系統開發的全過程。

sentences.english: Suggested Applications—Orange and other citrus flavors.
sentences.chinese: 可用於甜橙和其他柑橘的香精。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, combine sour cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla, and 1 cup sugar.
sentences.chinese: 同時，將酸奶油，1湯匙香草香精和一杯糖混合。

sentences.english: Food-gradeessences can add very strange flavours indeed.
sentences.chinese: 加入食物香精的確獲得一種與衆不同的香味。

sentences.english: Flavour and fragrance biosynthesis via bioconversion of specific substrates are described.
sentences.chinese: 記述了由特定底物的生物轉化合成香精香料。

sentences.english: Non-perfume added, avoids sensitive to skin or injured.
sentences.chinese: 不添加香精，避免對肌膚構成敏感或傷害。

sentences.english: Study on the bittering of chicken protein by the enzymatic hydrolysis;
sentences.chinese: 研究了用蛋白酶水解雞血蛋白製備肉味香精的工藝。

sentences.english: Patchouli essential oil can also be good for a variety of skincare treatments.
sentences.chinese: 廣霍香精油對各種皮膚保養問題的治療也很好。

sentences.english: The production of milk flavor by enzymatic interesterification of butter in non-aqueous system is studied in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 進行了非水體系脂肪酶催化生成奶味香精的研究。

sentences.english: Novel milk sweet flavor was composited with enzymed fresh milk and flavoring substances.
sentences.chinese: 採用酶解新鮮牛奶及香原料創擬而得乳化奶糖香精。

sentences.english: Essential oil obtained from cloves and used to flavor medicines.
sentences.chinese: 從丁香中獲取的香精油，用於給藥物加香味。

sentences.english: Many essential oils and artificial fragrances are used for scenting incense.
sentences.chinese: 許多香精油和人造的芳香劑被用來制帶香味的香。

sentences.english: The preparation of meat flavor by enzyme hydrolyzed pig haemoglobin was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了酶法水解豬血紅蛋白製備肉味香精的工藝。

sentences.english: Patchouli also has cell-regeneration properties and also has fungicidal properties.
sentences.chinese: 廣霍香精油還有促進細胞再生和抑制真菌的特點。

sentences.english: Add Corn flour, vinegar and vanilla extract, and whisk until just combined.
sentences.chinese: 加入玉米粉，醋，和香草香精，攪拌，混合。
